SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into student (student_id, student_name, student_qq, student_major, student_admission_time, student_graduated_school, student_online_id, student_daily_links, student_wishing, student_counseling_brother, student_where_know, student_portrait, student_phone, student_email, student_password, create_at, update_at ) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentQq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentAdmissionTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentGraduatedSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentOnlineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentDailyLinks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentWishing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentCounselingBrother,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentWhereKnow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentPhone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unix_timestamp(now()), unix_timestamp(now()) )
mapper.update: update student set student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_qq = #{studentQq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, student_major = #{studentMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_admission_time = #{studentAdmissionTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, student_graduated_school = #{studentGraduatedSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_online_id = #{studentOnlineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_daily_links = #{studentDailyLinks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_wishing = #{studentWishing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_counseling_brother = #{studentCounselingBrother,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_where_know = #{studentWhereKnow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_portrait = #{studentPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_phone = #{studentPhone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, student_email = #{studentEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_password = #{studentPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_at = unix_timestamp(now()) where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select student_id, student_name, student_qq, student_major, student_admission_time, student_graduated_school, student_online_id, student_daily_links, student_wishing, student_counseling_brother, student_where_know, student_portrait, student_phone, student_email, student_password, create_at, update_at from student where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
